Discover our comprehensive range of Islamic education courses designed for all ages and levels. Each course is carefully crafted to ensure optimal learning outcomes and spiritual growth.

Quran Courses

Nouraniyyah

30â‚¬

Learn correct reading of Quranic words starting from letters using the typical Nouraniyyah spelling method, up to complete verses. Basic Tajweed rules are also taught.

Duration: Monthly
Level: Beginner
Schedule: 2 sessions per week, 45 minutes each
Requirements:

No prior knowledge required

Course Features:

  • Letter recognition
  • Word building
  • Basic Tajweed
  • Verse reading

What You'll Gain:

  • Proven method used worldwide
  • Step-by-step progression
  • Interactive learning
  • Regular assessments
Enroll Now

Noorul-Bayaan

30â‚¬

A very popular method for learning Quran reading. From letters to reciting Quranic verses. Through spelling words and naming Tajweed rules.

Duration: Monthly
Level: Intermediate
Schedule: 2 sessions per week, 45 minutes each
Requirements:

Basic Arabic letter knowledge

Course Features:

  • Advanced spelling
  • Tajweed rules
  • Verse recitation
  • Pronunciation

What You'll Gain:

  • Advanced reading skills
  • Tajweed mastery
  • Fluency improvement
  • Confidence building
Enroll Now

Tajweed Intensive - LIVE

30â‚¬

A comprehensive course covering all areas of Tajweed science. Learn different reading styles with focus on Hafs-an-Asim.

Duration: Monthly
Level: Advanced
Schedule: 3 sessions per week, 60 minutes each
Requirements:

Intermediate Quran reading skills

Course Features:

  • Complete Tajweed
  • Reading styles
  • Articulation points
  • Scientific approach

What You'll Gain:

  • Professional recitation
  • Multiple reading styles
  • Scientific understanding
  • Certification ready

Reading Correction

25â‚¬

For students who can recite Quran slowly and need help with Tajweed rules. Uses the Taqliid (imitation) method.

Duration: Monthly
Level: All Levels
Schedule: 2 sessions per week, 45 minutes each
Requirements:

Basic recitation ability

Course Features:

  • Pronunciation correction
  • Tajweed application
  • Fluency improvement
  • Personal feedback

What You'll Gain:

  • Improved pronunciation
  • Better fluency
  • Tajweed application
  • Personal attention

Arabic Language Courses

Madina Arabic

35â‚¬

Focus on grammar and analyzing individual sentence parts. Build vocabulary through everyday and religious dialogues.

Duration: Monthly
Level: Beginner to Advanced
Schedule: 2 sessions per week, 60 minutes each
Requirements:

No prior Arabic knowledge needed

Course Features:

  • Grammar focus
  • Sentence analysis
  • Vocabulary building
  • Religious context

What You'll Gain:

  • Strong grammar foundation
  • Practical vocabulary
  • Religious context
  • Progressive levels
Enroll Now

Bayna Yadaik

35â‚¬

Uses "Al Arabiya bayna Yadayk" book series with many dialogues on everyday topics that promote free speaking.

Duration: Monthly
Level: Intermediate to Advanced
Schedule: 2 sessions per week, 60 minutes each
Requirements:

Basic Arabic knowledge

Course Features:

  • Conversational Arabic
  • Everyday dialogues
  • Free speaking
  • Hadith & Quran

What You'll Gain:

  • Conversational fluency
  • Practical communication
  • Cultural understanding
